meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or inherited from an ancestor.
meanings.sent1: The family heirloom held great sentimental value as it was an ancestral possession.
meanings.sent2: The ancestral traditions of the tribe were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed its ancestral toy mouse was a real mouse, and it would pounce on it playfully.
meanings.sent4: The old house had an ancestral charm that transported visitors back in time.
meanings.sent5: The ancestral portrait hanging in the hallway depicted a long line of distinguished ancestors.

meanings.sent1: My great-great-grandfather is an ancestral figure in our family history.
meanings.sent2: The researcher traced her ancestral roots back to a small village in Ireland.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel proudly displayed its ancestral acorn collection in the tree hollow.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins stood as a testament to the power of our ancestral civilizations.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased artifacts from various ancestral cultures around the world.
